Interface UserDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserDAOPostgres
public interface UserDAO
Interface for Data Access Object (DAO) operations related to the User entity. Provides methods for user authentication and data retrieval.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • login

      User login(String username, String password)
      Authenticates a user by their username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user attempting to log in.
      password - The password of the user attempting to log in.
      Returns:
      A User object if authentication is successful, or null if the credentials are invalid.

    • register

      User register(String email, String password, String username, String firstName, String lastName, int phoneNumber)
      Registers a new user.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      username - The username of the user.
      firstName - The first name of the user.
      lastName - The last name of the user.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the user.
      Returns:
      A User object if registration is successful, or null if the registration fails.

    • createUser

      boolean createUser(String email, String password, String username, String firstName, String lastName, int phoneNumber, boolean admin)
      Creates a new user.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      username - The username of the user.
      firstName - The first name of the user.
      lastName - The last name of the user.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the user.
      admin - Whether the user is an admin.
      Returns:
      true if the user was created successfully, false otherwise.

    • readUser

      User readUser(int id)
      Retrieves a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A User object containing the user's details.

    • getAllUsers

      List<User> getAllUsers(User user)
      Retrieves all users.
      Parameters:
      user - The user requesting the list.
      Returns:
      A list of User objects containing the details of all users.

    • updateUser

      boolean updateUser(User user)
      Updates the details of an existing user.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing the updated user details.
      Returns:
      true if the user was updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • deleteUser

      boolean deleteUser(int id)
      Deletes a user with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the user was deleted successfully, false otherwise.

    • followUser

      boolean followUser(int idFollowed, int idFollower)
      Follows a user.
      Parameters:
      idFollowed - The ID of the user to be followed.
      idFollower - The ID of the user who is following.
      Returns:
      true if the follow operation was successful, false otherwise.

    • unfollowUser

      boolean unfollowUser(int idFollowed, int idFollower)
      Unfollows a user.
      Parameters:
      idFollowed - The ID of the user to be unfollowed.
      idFollower - The ID of the user who is unfollowing.
      Returns:
      true if the unfollow operation was successful, false otherwise.

    • deleteAccount

      boolean deleteAccount(int id, String password)
      Deletes a user account.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      true if the account was deleted successfully, false otherwise.

    • updateAccount

      boolean updateAccount(User user)
      Updates a user account.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing the updated account details.
      Returns:
      true if the account was updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • isFollowing

      boolean isFollowing(int idFollowed, int idFollower)
      Checks if a user is following another user.
      Parameters:
      idFollowed - The ID of the user being followed.
      idFollower - The ID of the user who is following.
      Returns:
      true if the user is following, false otherwise.

    • getFollowsIds

      int[] getFollowsIds(int idFollower)
      Retrieves the IDs of users followed by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      idFollower - The ID of the user whose follows are being retrieved.
      Returns:
      An array of IDs of users followed by the specified user.
